resources.string: Get a fresh start in Jesus!

"Fresh Start Empowerment Centre is a faith community that will be more than just church. We seek to encourage every man woman and child that is affected by this ministry to not just go through the motions but to have a living vibrant exciting personal with Jesus Christ. \n\nBy releasing inspirational anointed musicians and colorful liberated worship we will encourage an atmosphere of spontaneous direction by the Holy Spirit. That atmosphere will promote a balanced wholeness where everyone is welcome and inspire an incubation for perpetual positive growth. We will have special care for children, people with special needs, the poor the elderly, the weak and will provide a sanctuary to the hurting oppressed addicted afflicted wounded sick and needy. At Fresh Start his mercies are abundant and new as the morning"
Connect with us during our service times!
Set a reminder to tune in!
Join the call with the link!
